original: intros Hb Hxy Heq. exists (Init.Nat.div (x - y * alpha_nat b 1) (alpha_nat b 2 - alpha_nat b 1 * alpha_nat b 1)). split. - apply alpha_nat_Pell in Hb. rewrite <- Heq. rewrite Nat.add_comm. apply Nat.div_unique with (r := x - y * alpha_nat b 1). assert (H1 : alpha_nat b (2) = b * alpha_nat b (1) - alpha_nat b (0)) by reflexivity. rewrite H1. rewrite <- alpha_nat_Pell with (n := 1) in Hb. nia. nia. - apply alpha_nat_Pell' in Hb. rewrite <- Heq. apply Nat.div_unique with (r := y). rewrite alpha_nat_Pell. nia. nia.
